00024 BusDefinition::BusDefinition(QDomDocument & doc): 
00025 LibraryComponent(doc),
00026 directConnection_(true),
00027 isAddressable_(true), 
00028 maxMasters_(-1),
00029 maxSlaves_(-1),
00030 systemGroupNames_(),    
00031 extends_(),
00032 attributes_()  {
00033 
00034         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
00035 
00036         // parse the attributes of the busDefinition
00037         // find the IP-Xact root element (spirit:component or spirit:design ...)
00038         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00039         int i = 0;
00040         // search for the first element with children (=document type)
00041         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00042                 ++i;
00043         }
00044 
00045         QDomNode busDefNode = doc.childNodes().item(i);
00046 
00047         // set the attributes
00048         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00049 
00050         // get directConnection
00051         QDomNodeList temp = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:directConnection");
00052         if (temp.size() > 0) {
00053                 QString directConnection = temp.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00054                 directConnection_ = General::str2Bool(directConnection, true);
00055         }
00056         else {
00057                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00058                                 "Mandatory element spirit:directConnection was not found"));
00059         }
00060 
00061         // get isAddressable
00062         QDomNodeList temp2 = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:isAddressable");
00063         if (temp2.size() > 0) {
00064                 QString isAddressable = temp2.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00065                 isAddressable_ = General::str2Bool(isAddressable, true);
00066         }
00067         else {
00068                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:isAddressable"
00069                                 " was not found"));
00070         }
00071 
00072         // get maxMasters_
00073         QDomNodeList temp3 = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:maxMasters");
00074         if (temp3.size() > 0) {
00075                 maxMasters_ = temp3.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00076         }
00077 
00078         // get maxSlaves
00079         QDomNodeList temp4 = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:maxSlaves");
00080         if (temp4.size() > 0) {
00081                 maxSlaves_ = temp4.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00082         }
00083 
00084         // get systemGroupNames
00085         QDomNodeList temp5 = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:systemGroupNames");
00086         for (int i = 0; i < temp5.item(0).childNodes().size(); ++i) {
00087                 QString systemGName = temp5.item(0).childNodes().item(i).
00088                                 childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00089                 systemGName = General::removeWhiteSpace(systemGName);
00090                 systemGroupNames_.append(systemGName);
00091         }
00092 
00093         // get extends
00094         QDomNodeList temp6 = doc.elementsByTagName("spirit:extends");
00095         if (temp6.size() > 0) {
00096                 QDomNode extendNode = temp6.item(0);
00097                 extends_ = General::createVLNV(extendNode, VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
00098         }
00099 
00100         // get vendor extensions
00101         QDomNodeList temp7 = doc.elementsByTagName("kactus2:kts_busdef_type");
00102         if (!temp7.isEmpty()) {
00103                 QDomNode typeNode = temp7.item(0);
00104                 kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_busdef_type", typeNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00105         }
00106 
00107         return;
00108 }

00134 BusDefinition & BusDefinition::operator=( BusDefinition const& other ) {
00135         if (this != &other) {
00136         
00137                 LibraryComponent::operator=(other);
00138 
00139                 directConnection_ = other.directConnection_;
00140                 isAddressable_ = other.isAddressable_;
00141                 maxMasters_ = other.maxMasters_;
00142                 maxSlaves_ = other.maxSlaves_;
00143                 systemGroupNames_ = other.systemGroupNames_;

00146         }

00158 void BusDefinition::write(QFile& file) {
00159         // create a writer instance and set it to operate on the given file
00160         QXmlStreamWriter writer(&file);
00161 
00162         // writer automatically adds whitespaces to make document more readable
00163         writer.setAutoFormatting(true);
00164         // writer uses one tab as indentation
00165         writer.setAutoFormattingIndent(-1);
00166 
00167         // call the base class implementation to write the top comment and
00168         // vlvn info. It also starts the <spirit:busDefinition> element
00169         LibraryComponent::write(writer);
00170 
00171         // set the attributes
00172         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00173 
00174         // write the attributes for the spirit:busDefinition element
00175         General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00176 
00177         // call base class to write the VLNV info
00178         LibraryComponent::writeVLNV(writer);
00179 
00180         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:directConnection",
00181                         General::bool2Str(directConnection_));
00182 
00183         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isAddressable",
00184                         General::bool2Str(isAddressable_));
00185 
00186         if (extends_.isValid()) {
00187                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:extends");
00188                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &extends_);
00189         }
00190 
00191         // write only if value defined
00192         if (maxMasters_ > 0) {
00193                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:maxMasters",
00194                                 QString::number(maxMasters_));
00195         }
00196 
00197         // write only if value defined
00198         if (maxSlaves_ > 0) {
00199                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:maxSlaves",
00200                                 QString::number(maxSlaves_));
00201         }
00202 
00203         if (systemGroupNames_.size() != 0) {
00204                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:systemGroupNames");
00205 
00206                 // write only the defined systemGroupnames
00207                 for (int i = 0; i < systemGroupNames_.size(); ++i) {
00208                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:systemGroupName",
00209                                         systemGroupNames_.at(i));
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 // systemGroupNames
00213                 writer.writeEndElement();
00214         }
00215 
00216         // if description is specified in the base class
00217         if (!LibraryComponent::description_.isEmpty()) {
00218                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00219         }
00220 
00221         // if contains kactus2 attributes
00222         if (!kactus2Attributes_.isEmpty()) {
00223                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00224                 writer.writeStartElement("kactus2:extensions");
00225 
00226                 writeKactus2Attributes(writer);
00227 
00228                 writer.writeEndElement(); // kactus2:extensions
00229                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:vendorExtensions
00230         }
00231 
00232         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:busDefinition
00233         writer.writeEndDocument();
00234         return;
00235 }

00291 const QList<VLNV> BusDefinition::getDependentVLNVs() const {
00292         QList<VLNV> vlnvList;
00293 
00294         // append the vlnv of the busDefinition that is extended by this
00295         // busDefinition
00296         if (extends_.isValid()) {
00297                 vlnvList.append(extends_);
00298         }
00299         return vlnvList;
00300 }

00316 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00317 // Function: setType()
00318 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00319 void BusDefinition::setType(KactusAttribute::BusDefType type) {
00320     kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_busdef_type", KactusAttribute::valueToString(type));
00321 }
00322 
00323 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00324 // Function: getType()
00325 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00326 KactusAttribute::BusDefType BusDefinition::getType() const {
00327     KactusAttribute::BusDefType type = KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW;
00328 
00329     if (kactus2Attributes_.contains(QString("kts_busdef_type"))) {
00330         KactusAttribute::stringToValue(kactus2Attributes_.value(QString("kts_busdef_type")), type);
00331     }
00332 
00333     return type;
00334 }
